characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Words of Radiance (mentioned),  Oathbringer,  Rhythm of War (mentioned)

characterDescription:
Cultivation is one of the sixteen Shards of Adonalsium and one of the three Shards located on Roshar.
A reference by the Almighty (a god according to Vorinism, also known as Honor, and her lover) in one of Dalinar's visions lends insight into her abilities.

characterDetails.Appearance: She has brown skin the color of darkwood bark. She has a matronly build and wears a sweeping brown dress which seems to become bark or grass, melding with her surroundings. Vines from her dress curl into the earth, permeating everything. Her voice is like tumbling stones.
characterDetails.Abilities:
Some of the many spren found on Roshar were created by Cultivation and Honor at some point before the Desolations began, by Splintering themselves.
Cultivation is responsible for Dalinar's boon.*
She may be responsible for spren relating to physical phenomena:
(To be continued.)
characterDetails.Notes:
Cultivation's Shardholder is still alive.
(In the above quote, Wit is referring to Cultivation.)
*Cultivation has intervened before.
She has been confirmed by Brandon to be a dragon.
